search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Referrizer (referrizer.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Referrizer can be found at: [https://business.referrizer.com/pricing](https://business.referrizer.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

Referrizer Pricing Options
--------------------------

Select Your Plan
================

Annually Monthly

Free
----

For companies just starting out that need a boost in their marketing

### $0/mo

No credit card required

[Get Started for Free](https://backend.referrizer.com/signup/start-now.php?pack=2&couponCode=REPFREE)

#### Free plan includes

Manage & Track Reviews

Import Contacts with CSV

Email-Based Campaigns

CRM

Reputation LITE
---------------

For growth-driven companies that want to real results in less time

### $79/mo

Paid annually

[Start 15 Days Trial](https://backend.referrizer.com/signup/start-now.php?pack=2&couponCode=REPLITE)

#### Everything in Free, plus

Add Integration

Use AI

Reputation Widget

Boost Reviews Email Campaign

**Most Popular**
----------------

Reputation MAX
--------------

For power users who want maximum support with every tool

### $119/mo

Paid annually

[Start 30 Days Trial](https://backend.referrizer.com/signup/start-now.php?pack=2&couponCode=REPTMAX)

#### Everything in LITE, plus

SMS Campaigns

Check-in based SMS

ROI Dashboard

1000 SMS review requests mo...

Premium
-------

For power users who want maximum support with every tool

### Let’s talk

We’ll customize it to your needs

[Contact Sales](http://scheduler.referrizer.com/demo)

#### Everything in MAX + optional

Offers & Referrals

Loyalty

Smart Line

View All Optional Features

Pipeline

AI Assistant (beta)

These features are optional, and are not included in this plan by default

Free
----

For companies just starting out that need a boost in their marketing

### $0/mo

No credit card required

[Get Started for Free](https://backend.referrizer.com/signup/start-now.php?pack=2&couponCode=REPFREE)

#### Free plan includes

Manage & Track Reviews

Import Contacts with CSV

Email-Based Campaigns

CRM

Reputation LITE
---------------

For growth-driven companies that want to real results in less time

### $99/mo

Month-to-month

[Start 15 Days Trial](https://backend.referrizer.com/signup/start-now.php?pack=2&couponCode=REPLITE)

#### Everything in Free, plus

Add Integration

Use AI

Reputation Widget

Boost Reviews Email Campaign

**Most Popular**
----------------

Reputation MAX
--------------

For power users who want maximum support with every tool

### $199/mo

Month-to-month

[Start 30 Days Trial](https://backend.referrizer.com/signup/start-now.php?pack=2&couponCode=REPTMAX)

#### Everything in LITE, plus

SMS Campaigns

Check-in based SMS

ROI Dashboard

1000 SMS review requests mo...

Premium
-------

For power users who want maximum support with every tool

### Let’s talk

We’ll customize it to your needs

[Contact Sales](http://scheduler.referrizer.com/demo)

#### Everything in MAX + optional

Offers & Referrals

Loyalty

Smart Line

View All Optional Features

Pipeline

AI Assistant (beta)

These features are optional, and are not included in this plan by default

 

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

Don’t see your question answered here?

[View More](https://support.referrizer.com/en)

How quickly will I see results?

Results usually vary depending on the size and type of your business. 97% of our clients are happy with the results and value Referrizer provides them. In order to speed up the traction and hit your goals faster, we recommend reaching out to the onboarding team and engaging our professional marketing coaches.

Is my data safe and secure? Do you share It with anyone?

Data security is our highest priority. Using numerous redundant data safety systems and following strict compliance procedures, we ensure the highest level of data protection for our subscribers, including your clients’ credit card information.

I'm a current Referrizer customer, what happens to my existing plan?

All current Referrizer customers can keep their existing (grandfathered) plan indefinitely, but upgrading or downgrading will require switching to a new plan.

What are your technical support hours?

Our technical support hours are 9am – 5pm EST on weekdays (excluding holidays). For assistance, you can email us at [support@reternzer.com](mailto:support@reternzer.com) or call our customer service center at [(855) 773-0774](tel:+18557730774).

Can someone run an account for me?

Sure, we got you! To get Referrizer up and running quickly, consider our Platinum package. A Referrizer product expert will take care of the manual work and tailor the software to your specific needs. For more information, reach out to our [sales team](https://business.referrizer.com/bookdemo/).

Will somebody help me set up my account?

As soon as you sign up, you’ll be booked for an onboarding session to learn more about using Referrizer to grow your business. After that, you get a 1-on-1 call with an onboarding coach, who can further help setting up your account.

Consider upgrading to our Platinum package, where you will receive ongoing, custom-tailored support from a dedicated coach. Contact our [sales team](https://business.referrizer.com/bookdemo/) for more details.

Don’t see your question answered here?

[View More](https://support.referrizer.com/en)

See what our clients have achieved with Referrizer
--------------------------------------------------

### All of our locations have definitely increased reviews...

Our reviews are through the roof, thanks to Referrizer. I've been doing this for 20 years, and I've never had this many reviews. The platform does what it says it's going to, which is great.

![Image 39: Brad Blair](blob:http://localhost/12a69136da1a80c313b36dca9a5c6386)

Brad BlairOwner at Pacific Tanning

### 180 five star Google reviews in less than 6 months...

Prior to Referrizer we were struggling to get people to review us on Google. I LOVE that Referrizer does it all. It has really helped with our Google reputation and with SEO.

![Image 41: Donna Mabon](blob:http://localhost/346dadc7249b4f18bcd4f1d0d397bce6)

Donna MabonOwner at Goosebumps Cryotherapy

### Good value for money...

Have greatly increased the number of our reviews (from 30 to 160 in a year) and been able to weed out some of the negative ones. Easy to use use. Ongoing training and support are great.

![Image 43: Haroon Nawaz](blob:http://localhost/70ce6aee2bbba07f009d5712cad469ab)

Haroon NawazOwner at Lake Buena Vista Aesthetics

[![Image 45: Referrizer logo](blob:http://localhost/4c9d725297516d248ad4a0088407ca8b)](https://business.referrizer.com/)

### Solutions

*   [AI Assistant](https://business.referrizer.com/features/ai-assistant/)
*   [Email Marketing](https://business.referrizer.com/features/emailmarketing/)
*   [Partner Up Network](https://business.referrizer.com/features/partnerup/)
*   [Smart Line](https://business.referrizer.com/features/smartline/)
*   [Reputation Management](https://business.referrizer.com/features/reputationmanagement/)
*   [Landing Pages](https://business.referrizer.com/features/landing/)
*   [Lead Management System](https://business.referrizer.com/features/leadmanagementsystem/)
*   [Offers & Referrals](https://business.referrizer.com/features/offersreferrals/)
*   [2-Way Text Messaging](https://business.referrizer.com/features/textmarketing/)
*   [Loyalty Program](https://business.referrizer.com/features/loyalty/)

*   [2-Way Text Messaging](https://business.referrizer.com/features/textmarketing/)
*   [Loyalty Program](https://business.referrizer.com/features/loyalty/)

### Help

*   [Contact Us](https://business.referrizer.com/contactus/)
*   [Knowledge Base](https://support.referrizer.com/en)

*   [Contact Us](https://business.referrizer.com/contactus/)

[![Image 47: Referrizer logo](blob:http://localhost/4c9d725297516d248ad4a0088407ca8b)](https://business.referrizer.com/)

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

Don’t see your question answered here?

[View More](https://support.referrizer.com/en)

How quickly will I see results?

Results usually vary depending on the size and type of your business. 97% of our clients are happy with the results and value Referrizer provides them. In order to speed up the traction and hit your goals faster, we recommend reaching out to the onboarding team and engaging our professional marketing coaches.

Is my data safe and secure? Do you share It with anyone?

Data security is our highest priority. Using numerous redundant data safety systems and following strict compliance procedures, we ensure the highest level of data protection for our subscribers, including your clients’ credit card information.

I'm a current Referrizer customer, what happens to my existing plan?

All current Referrizer customers can keep their existing (grandfathered) plan indefinitely, but upgrading or downgrading will require switching to a new plan.

What are your technical support hours?

Our technical support hours are 9am – 5pm EST on weekdays (excluding holidays). For assistance, you can email us at [support@reternzer.com](mailto:support@reternzer.com) or call our customer service center at [(855) 773-0774](tel:+18557730774).

Can someone run an account for me?

Sure, we got you! To get Referrizer up and running quickly, consider our Platinum package. A Referrizer product expert will take care of the manual work and tailor the software to your specific needs. For more information, reach out to our [sales team](https://business.referrizer.com/bookdemo/).

Will somebody help me set up my account?

As soon as you sign up, you’ll be booked for an onboarding session to learn more about using Referrizer to grow your business. After that, you get a 1-on-1 call with an onboarding coach, who can further help setting up your account.

Consider upgrading to our Platinum package, where you will receive ongoing, custom-tailored support from a dedicated coach. Contact our [sales team](https://business.referrizer.com/bookdemo/) for more details.

Don’t see your question answered here?

[View More](https://support.referrizer.com/en)

See what our clients have achieved with Referrizer
--------------------------------------------------

### All of our locations have definitely increased reviews...

Our reviews are through the roof, thanks to Referrizer. I've been doing this for 20 years, and I've never had this many reviews. The platform does what it says it's going to, which is great.

![Image 39: Brad Blair](blob:http://localhost/12a69136da1a80c313b36dca9a5c6386)

Brad BlairOwner at Pacific Tanning

### 180 five star Google reviews in less than 6 months...

Prior to Referrizer we were struggling to get people to review us on Google. I LOVE that Referrizer does it all. It has really helped with our Google reputation and with SEO.

![Image 41: Donna Mabon](blob:http://localhost/346dadc7249b4f18bcd4f1d0d397bce6)

Donna MabonOwner at Goosebumps Cryotherapy

### Good value for money...

Have greatly increased the number of our reviews (from 30 to 160 in a year) and been able to weed out some of the negative ones. Easy to use use. Ongoing training and support are great.

![Image 43: Haroon Nawaz](blob:http://localhost/70ce6aee2bbba07f009d5712cad469ab)
